info.title: Meetup Members API
info.description: The API for managing Meetup members.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: comma-separate list of optional fields

parameters.name: add_topics
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of topics ids to add to your alert list

parameters.name: bio
parameters.description: Free form text passage about you. must be less than 250 characters

parameters.name: bio_privacy
parameters.description: Controls the visibility of the members bio. May be one of visible, hidden

parameters.name: birthday
parameters.description: Day you were born. Format should be in the form of yyyy or mmddyyyy. A value of -1 indicates that birthday data should be cleared.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name for your location

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: Valid city id from /2/cities method

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Valid country code for your location

parameters.name: facebook_privacy
parameters.description: Controls the visibility of the members facebook connection. May be one of visible, hidden. If the member has not connected their Facebook account, attempts to set this preference will do nothing.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Your gender (used for better recommendations). Value may be one of other, none, female, male

parameters.name: groups_privacy
parameters.description: Controls the visibility of the members groups. May be one of visible, hidden

parameters.name: hometown
parameters.description: Hometown of member. Can not be longer than 64 characters

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language preference used on the site. Valid values are en_us, it, es, fr, de, pt, ja

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitude of city

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: longitude of city

parameters.name: messaging_pref
parameters.description: This specifies the members preference for being contacted from members on the site. Possible values are orgs_only meaning only group organizers can contact you, groups_only meaning only members of your group can contact you, or all_members meaning all members may contact you.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the current member

parameters.name: photos_privacy
parameters.description: Controls the visibility of the members photos. May be one of visible, hidden

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: A valid photo_id from the members photos to set as the main profile photo. A value of 0 will unset the current photo

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius, in miles to search for city given a lat and lon. default 25.0, max 100.0

parameters.name: remove_topics
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of topic ids to remove from your alert list

parameters.name: sync_photo
parameters.description: When set to true, this parameter will sync all of the group profile photos for the member with the provided photo_id

parameters.name: topics_privacy
parameters.description: Controls the visibility of the members topics. May be one of visible, hidden

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Valid zip code for city

get.description: API method for accessing members of Meetup Groups

parameters.name: *group_id
parameters.description: Return members in groups with these ID numbers, separated by commas

parameters.name: *group_urlname
parameters.description: Return members for the group with the given custom URL path

parameters.name: *member_id
parameters.description: Return the member with this ID

parameters.name: *service
parameters.description: Match users by the external services theyve linked to their member account, specified as servicename:identifier. For example, service=twitter:@MeetupAPI finds any member account that lists @MeetupAPI as its Twitter name (none, currently). You can query against several at a time by separating them with commas. Facebook identifiers should be provided as numeric values

parameters.name: *topic,groupnum
parameters.description: Return members for the group with given topic and number

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Request that additional fields (separated by commas) be included in the output.

post.description: Uploads a photo to be associated with a Member

parameters.name: *photo
parameters.description: The photo, encoded as multipart/form-data. The maximum file size allowed is 10MB

parameters.name: await
parameters.description: If true, this ensures a response will not be returned until the upload is accessible

parameters.name: main
parameters.description: Set to true to have this photo become the members main profile photo. Otherwise, it will become the main photo only when none other is selected. If the authenticated member does not already have a main profile photo set it will remain so.

parameters.name: sync_matching_photo
parameters.description: When set to true and main is set to true, this will replace all group profile photos matching the current photo with the provided replacement

parameters.name: sync_photo
parameters.description: When set to true, this parameter will sync all of the group profile photos for the member with the provided photo_id
